pandemonium_curse.behemothscataclysm.cat: All Cataclysmic bosses now have a 30% chance to critically strike, dealing 130% damage.
pandemonium_curse.behemothscataclysm.dee: Deepling species now spawn with reinforcements and gain increased movement speed.
Deeplings now gain a 15% chance to spawn as a Deepling Priest and Deepling Priests can now constantly heal nearby Deepling species.
pandemonium_curse.behemothscataclysm.kob: Koboletons now spawn in much larger groups and has a 15% chance to turn into a Wadjet.
